text: The Knight of Newts is an adventure for the Rules Cyclopedia edition of the Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, published in 1993. ==Contents== * The Newt, A New Monster * New Color Monster Standups * New Magical Items * Color Poster Map * New Rules for Adventuring Underwater ==Publication history== The Knight of Newts was designed by Dale "slade" Henson, and Doug Stewart was the editor. Cover art was by David Dorman, with interior art by Dave Simons and Karl Waller. ==Reception== ==Reviews== *White Wolf #38 ==References== Category:Dungeons & Dragons modules Category:Mystara
title: The Knight of Newts
